attributes.review: Easy to use and keep up on all things related to our next President, Donald J. Trump!!!
attributes.title: Great App

attributes.review: App so far is great! It's full of real time news, campaign info, and upcoming Rallies.
attributes.title: The truth!

attributes.review: This app sets a new standard in quality supporter engagement. Trump's team nailed it.
attributes.title: Impressive

attributes.review: This app is amazing. Great for Trump supporters, and I advise all Trump haters and Hillary supporters to give it a try. Maybe it'll open your eyes.
attributes.title: Vote Donald Trump 2016

attributes.review: Go get 'em Trump. You will be the best President ever!!
attributes.title: Bet this is under budget and ahead of schedule!

attributes.review: Easy to use, great way to spread the word. Well done application.
attributes.title: Great app

attributes.review: Love this app, I can't wait to make America great again, for all Americans.
attributes.title: American

attributes.review:
Great app to follow one of the greatest presidential candidates in my lifetime. 
...wonder why this is suddenly not on the homepage anymore... hmm
attributes.title: Great app

attributes.review: He's not a perfect person at all, but he is better than a criminal.
attributes.title: Yay Trump.

attributes.review: So awesome to have an app!! Hell yeah! Trump's bluntness is so refreshing!!! Let's take back our country!!!
attributes.title: Trump for President!!!!
